PROFILE A bout three years of experience in various development environments . High Independent learning skills. Team player, e xcellent communication, and verbal skills. Experience in managing and training a team . Microsoft Office applications. EXPERIENCE FULL STACK DEVELOPER , SOLVE HERZILIA 2022 - 2023 Development of a website and application starting from scratch (architecture and characterization ) until the packaging of the product and its delivery to . FULL STACK WEB DEVELOPER , INDEPENDENT COPENHAGEN DENMARK 2021 - 2022 Website development for an independent business , serving families of terminally ill patients. CUSTOMERS RELATIONS AND TECHNICAL DEPARTMENT MANAGEMENT, ELECTRONICE - PRO MODI'IN - MACCBIM 2019 - 2022 Management of a technical team near the technical VP . Special handling and legal complaints, the " Israeli Consumer Council " , and social networks . Work with many interfaces at the same time (such as field technicians, warehouses, procurement, customer relations and more). In addition, accompanying the process until its completion. The position required thinking outside the box For the box the box is often very high, creativity and dedication. FINANCIAL LENDER , INDEPENDENT 2018 After a six - month training, I was involved in the field of counseling and financial support for families to get out of financial crises (and among the ultra - Orthodox society) by a well - known organization in Israel. The support included frequent meetings, s etting goals and introducing a routine of individual checks that the client should perform when the ambition is to achieve financial independence. EDUCATION FULL STACK DEVELOPER CERTIFICATE IN WEB TECHNOLOGIES AND APPLICATIONS, JOHN BRYCE TRAINING COLLEGE, TEL AVIV

FINANCIAL LENDER , INDEPENDENT 2018 After a six - month training, I was involved in the field of counseling and financial support for families to get out of financial crises (and among the ultra - Orthodox society) by a well - known organization in Israel. The support included frequent meetings, s etting goals and introducing a routine of individual checks that the client should perform when the ambition is to achieve financial independence.
EDUCATION FULL STACK DEVELOPER CERTIFICATE IN WEB TECHNOLOGIES AND APPLICATIONS, JOHN BRYCE TRAINING COLLEGE, TEL AVIV

Meir Juli Full stack web developer | mybs2323@gmail.com | 0587769313 Experience Full stack web developer Solve , הרצליה Backend – 50%, frontend – 50%  Developed and deployed full-stack web applications with a 50/50 split between front-end and back-end responsibilities (backend-oriented)  Implemented complex queries and aggregation frameworks for MongoDB (NoSQL) alongside SQL databases  Built user interfaces using the React framework, leveraging extensive knowledge of third-party libraries.  Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for application communication.  Deployed applications and web applications on Azure Cloud using CI/CD tools and Github Workflows.  Published React Native applications on the Google Play Store, handling all related configurations.  Collaborated with UI/UX teams using Figma to provide valuable input on interface design and architecture. Full stack web developer Freelancer, Copenhagen Denmark (remotely)  Utilized the same skillset (mentioned above) to develop web applications during a 6-month contract .  Cloud - Google cloud platform Education Diploma, website and application development John Brayce Skills  Programming Languages: JavaScript, Python (potentially, based on teaching experience)  Frameworks: React (extensive knowledge of libraries), Angular, React Native  Databases: SQL, NoSQL (MongoDB)  Cloud Platforms: Azure (CI/CD with Github Workflows)  Version Control: Git  Design: Figma (basic proficiency)  APIs: RESTful Soft:  Communication  Teamwork, Teaching/Mentoring (from teaching experience)  Problem-solving  Adaptability מאיר ג'ולי 058-776-9313 | mybs2323@gmail.com ניסיון תעסוקתי מפתח תוכנה Solve , הרצליה חברת סטארט-אפ  פיתוח אתר SaaS מאפס ופריסתו לממשקים השונים (כגון Azure cloud ( בעזרת כלי CI/CD . האחראי היחידי על פריסת אפליקציית React- native לתשתית של Google play תוך תחזוקה שוטפת ועמידה בכל המדיניות המשתנה והק.  עבודת פיתוח מחולקת בשווה 50% צד לקוח ו- 50% צד שרת. אוריינטציה לצד שרת.  יישום שאילתות מורכבות בכל סוגי מסדי הנתונים.  בניית ממשק משתמש בצד לקוח React תוך שימוש במגוון רחב של ספריות צד שלישי. עבודת צוות שוטפת מול אנשי UI/UX ומתן עצות והדרכה בהתאם לצרכי לקוח.  כתיבת טסטים וביצוע בדיקות לפני שחרור גרסאות בסביבת production . מפתח תוכנה קופנהגן דנמרק (מרוחק)  בניית אתר עבור עסק עצמאי שנועד לספק פלטפורמה עבור קרובי משפחה של חולים סופניים.  עבודה בצוות קטן החל משלב התכנון. הנדסאי תוכנה John Brayce  תעודת משרד הכלכלה והעבודה. כישורים  פיתוח בסביבות סטראט-אפ חדשניות ויכולת הבנת תהליכים בהתאם.  ניסיון עבודה רב בעבודה בצוותים גדולים וקטנים כאחד.  פיתוח קומפוננטות לשימוש חוזר.  יישום מירב מעקרונות פיתוח תוכנה (כגון: ( S.O.L.I.D  עצמאות וראש גדול ויכולת ביצוע משימות ברמה גבוהה מאוד.

Meir Juli - 058-776-9313 - Mybs2323@gmail.com Highly motivated and results-oriented Full-Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience building and deploying web and mobile applications. Proven ability to manage both front-end and back-end development using a variety of technologies. Skilled in SQL, NoSQL databases (MongoDB), Firebase, React (extensive knowledge of third-party libraries), Angular, RESTful APIs, Azure Cloud deployments (CI/CD with Github Workflows), React Native app publishing, and UI/UX collaboration using Figma. Currently working as a Department Manager Assistant in the EV charging field, seeking to leverage technical expertise in a full-time or part-time role focused on technology and innovation. Additionally, passionate about sharing knowledge and actively teach programming in my free time.
